welcome_message_body: "Welcome to La Victoria, Colombia! Prepare to be enchanted by this charming city known for its vibrant culture, friendly locals, and stunning landscapes. Embrace the beauty and diversity of La Victoria – we invite you to explore and enjoy all it has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cartago Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Cartago Airport is responsible for handling all air freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
